entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
